alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz and Maricopa Counties through 615 PM MST... At 530 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Gladden, or 24 miles northwest of Tonopah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gladden and Wenden. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 57 and 83. US Highway 60 between mile markers 63 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Tonopah Desert
